title: Michele Sutto
text:
Michele Sutto (born 11 February 1986) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. His usual position is as a <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">Lock</a> and he currently plays for <a href="Rugby%20Mogliano">Mogliano</a> in <a href="Top12">Top12</a>.
In <a href="2014%E2%80%9315%20Pro12">2014–15 Pro12</a> and <a href="2015%E2%80%9316%20Pro14">2015–16 Pro14</a> seasons, he was named "Additional Player" for <a href="Zebre">Zebre</a>.
